headline.main: Michelle Obama Surprises Students on Visit to DC High School
headline.print_headline: Michelle Obama Surprises Students on Visit to DC High School

docs.lead_paragraph: Former first lady Michelle Obama has made a surprise visit to a Washington high school.

headline.main: Kennedy Library Picks Obama for 'Profiles in Courage' Award
headline.print_headline: Kennedy Library Picks Obama for 'Profiles in Courage' Award

docs.lead_paragraph: Former U.S. President Barack Obama on Thursday was named this year's winner of the John F. Kennedy Presidential Library's "Profile in Courage" award, an annual honor for leaders who stand up to political opponents.
docs.snippet: Former U.S. President Barack Obama on Thursday was named this year's winner of the John F. Kennedy Presidential Library's "Profile in Courage" award, an annual honor for leaders who stand up to political opponents....

headline.main: Trump Orders Review of Obama Rule Protecting Small Streams
headline.print_headline: Trump Orders Review of Obama Rule Protecting Small Streams

docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump has signed an executive order mandating a review of an Obama-era rule aimed at protecting small streams and wetlands from development and pollution, fulfilling a campaign promise while earning the ire of environmental groups.
docs.snippet: President Donald Trump has signed an executive order mandating a review of an Obama-era rule aimed at protecting small streams and wetlands from development and pollution, fulfilling a campaign promise while earning the ire of environmental groups...

headline.main: Justice Department Keeps For-Profit Prisons, Scrapping an Obama Plan
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Keep Private Prisons, Scrapping an Obama Plan

docs.lead_paragraph: Attorney General Jeff Sessions directed federal prison officials to keep using the private prisons, which the Obama administration had planned to phase out.

headline.main: What’s on TV Wednesday: Tracee Ellis Ross, Stevie Wonder and Michelle Obama

docs.lead_paragraph: The ABC sitcom “black-ish,” whose Tracee Ellis Ross just won a Golden Globe, re-examines the “I Have a Dream” speech. And Michelle Obama and Stevie Wonder visit “The Tonight Show.”

headline.main: Trump to Order Reversal of Obama Water Regulation Rule: Official
headline.print_headline: Trump to Order Reversal of Obama Water Regulation Rule: Official

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to sign a measure as early as Tuesday aimed at rescinding a major Obama administration water regulation and direct an end to the government's defense of the rule, a Trump official briefed on the plan said late Friday.

headline.main: Obama Administration Rushed to Preserve Intelligence of Russian Election Hacking
headline.print_headline: Obama Officials Raced to Preserve Russian Trail

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG, ADAM GOLDMAN and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

docs.lead_paragraph: Obama administration officials scrambled to ensure intelligence of connections between the Trump campaign and Russian officials was preserved after they left office.

headline.main: U.S. Education Secretary Calls Obama Transgender Guidelines 'Overreach'
headline.print_headline: U.S. Education Secretary Calls Obama Transgender Guidelines 'Overreach'

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Education Secretary Betsy DeVos on Thursday criticized as "overreach" former President Barack Obama's guidelines to public schools to let transgender students use the bathrooms of their choice, one day after President Donald Trump revoked the guidance.

headline.main: House Votes to Lift Obama Limits on Alaska Hunting, Trapping
headline.print_headline: House Votes to Lift Obama Limits on Alaska Hunting, Trapping

docs.lead_paragraph: The House has approved a bill to lift some Obama administration restrictions on hunting and trapping of bears, wolves and other predators on federal lands in Alaska.
